A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don’t bother seeing this movie. As a stand-alone film it was incoherent at best. As a continuation of the Star Wars franchise it is insulting. This movie if filled with moral relativism that has no place in this fantasy universe. Also\, as another reviewer said there’s absolutely no magic. Johnson should be ashamed of what he wrote and directed. I hope the Disney execs are happy with the money they fleeced out of generations of fans for this turd of a movie.
